name: web-final-project
description: The final web project by Otabek Ortikov

scripts.prod: sass src/styles/styles.scss src/styles/css/styles.css && postcss src/styles/css/styles.css --use autoprefixer --discard-duplicates --replace && postcss src/styles/css/styles.css --use cssnano --replace

author: Otabek Ortikov
